response.overview: The video draws poignant parallels between the melting of permafrost, the loss of biodiversity, and the Indigenous understanding of the body as an extension of the land. While dominant power structures continue to systematically erase the knowledge, culture, and identities bound to the land, there is a pressing need to create space for the remembrance and reaffirmation of ancestral wisdom.
response.title: Everything Alive Becomes Quiet
